Package org.apache.wicket.jmx

Exposes Wicket's settings via Java Management Extensions (JMX).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ApplicationMBean MBean interface for exposing application related information and functionality.
ApplicationSettingsMBean Application settings.
DebugSettingsMBean Debug settings.
MarkupSettingsMBean Markup settings.
PageSettingsMBean Page settings.
RequestCycleSettingsMBean Request cycle settings.
RequestLoggerMBean Interface for exposing the request logger.
ResourceSettingsMBean Resource settings.
SecuritySettingsMBean Security settings.
SessionSettingsMBean Session settings.
StoreSettingsMBean JMX MBean for Application's StoreSettings
 

Class Summary
Application Exposes Application related functionality for JMX.
ApplicationSettings Exposes Application related functionality for JMX.
DebugSettings Exposes Application related functionality for JMX.
Initializer Registers Wicket's MBeans.
MarkupSettings Exposes Application related functionality for JMX.
PageSettings Exposes Application related functionality for JMX.
RequestCycleSettings Exposes Application related functionality for JMX.

SessionSettings Exposes Application related functionality for JMX.
StoreSettings Exposes Application's StoreSettings for JMX.
 

Package org.apache.wicket.jmx Description

Exposes Wicket's settings via Java Management Extensions (JMX).

An easy way to enable JMX is to provide argument -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote when starting up your application.
